  • Method Details

    • release

      public static void release(com.documentum.fc.client.IDfSession session)
      Release a DFC session safely. A context session will not be released.
      Parameters:
      session - the DFC session to be released
      See Also:
      • ContextSessionManager
      • RepositorySession
